item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Friends
We will be meeting at Buttonwood Park in New Bedford. The Park is a great spot to meetup! Rocky and Roxie really love it there. We will meet by the duckpond on Brownell Ave!!!
Hope to see you all on April 5th!!! If it rains we will meet at our home!!!
Bob and Linda
item.how_to_find_us: Buttonwood park in New Bedford-near the duckpond on Brownell Ave

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier April Meetup
